nodes.author: various authors

description.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"9vt's second short story anthology, with two dozen pieces from fifteen writers—both friends and strangers, about family and lovers, about those no longer with us and those we can never get rid of no matter how hard we try.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"which is to say, little slices of life, real and imagined, in a variety of styles and expressions, all of which we think you’ll enjoy.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"includes pieces by Angelo Bariga Allito, Rachel Attias, Kate Biel, Summer Bordon, Khaalid Cannon, Jack George, Kurt Hoberg, Erin F. O’Leary, Ben Carter Olcott, Marlon Webster Paine, Zelda Solomon, Bennington Southwell, Jacob Spann, Cassidy Spencer, and George Tomsett; and artwork by Angela Rauf.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

nodes.title: Forgetfulness, naught else
nodes.editors: Marlon Webster Paine, Zelda Solomon, Jack George
